author: Defold
description: Steamworks SDK provides a range of features which are designed to help ship your application or game on Steam in an efficient manner.
name: Steamworks

releases.message:
CHANGE: Use lua_Integer when the underlying type makes sense (int vs float)
FIX: LobbyMatchList_t and m_nLobbiesMatching has been changed from uint64t (represented as a string) to lua_Integer

NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_add_request_lobby_list_string_filter()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_add_request_lobby_list_numerical_filter()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_add_request_lobby_list_near_value_filter()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_add_request_lobby_list_filter_slots_available()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_add_request_lobby_list_distance_filter()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_add_request_lobby_list_result_count_filter()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_add_request_lobby_list_compatible_members_filter()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_set_lobby_owner()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_set_lobby_type()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_set_lobby_joinable()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_set_lobby_member_limit()`
NEW: Added `steam.matchmaking_get_lobby_member_limit()`

Contributions by morgerion

NEW: `steam.matchmaking_create_lobby()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::CreateLobby(...)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_join_lobby()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::JoinLobby(CSteamID)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_leave_lobby()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::LeaveLobby(CSteamID)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_set_lobby_data()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::SetLobbyData(...)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_get_lobby_data()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::GetLobbyData(...)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_get_lobby_data_count()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::GetLobbyDataCount(...)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_get_lobby_data_by_index()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::GetLobbyDataByIndex(...)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_get_num_lobby_members()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::GetNumLobbyMembers(CSteamID)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_get_lobby_member_by_index()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::GetLobbyMemberByIndex(CSteamID, i)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_send_lobby_chat_msg()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::SendLobbyChatMsg(...)`
NEW: `steam.matchmaking_get_lobby_chat_entry()` -> `ISteamMatchmaking::GetLobbyChatEntry(...)`
NEW: `LobbyCreated_t` event
NEW: `LobbyEnter_t` event
NEW: `LobbyChatUpdate_t` event
NEW: `LobbyChatMsg_t` event

NEW: Added `steam.friends_set_rich_presence(key, value)`
NEW: Added `steam.friends_clear_rich_presence()`

Thanks @tferreira !

NEW: [`steam.utils_show_floating_gamepad_text_input()`](https://defold.com/extension-steam/steam_api/#steam.utils_show_floating_gamepad_text_input:mode-x-y-width-height)
NEW: [`steam.utils_show_gamepad_text_input()`](https://defold.com/extension-steam/steam_api/#steam.utils_show_gamepad_text_input:input_mode-line_input_mode-description-existing_text)

Example of how to get gamepad text input: https://github.com/defold/extension-steam/blob/master/examples/utils/utils.gui_script#L24-L33

NEW: Added `steam.utils_get_server_real_time()`
NEW: Added `steam.user_stats_upload_leaderboard_score(leaderboard, method, score)`
